text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs - Beef Flavor

Item keywords:
Formulated specifically for dogs
Does not foam
Controls plaque
Fights bad breath
Beef and poultry flavors
text.Response A: Dental health is critical for everyone, even man's best friend.  Petrodex Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is formulated specifically for dogs.  The non-foaming formula helps control plaque and fights bad breath in your pooch.  Offered in poultry or beef flavors, there's something for every pet's palette to ensure acceptance.
text.Response B: Attention dog owners! Are you tired of your dog's bad breath and plaque-covered teeth? Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is the solution you've been searching for. This toothpaste is specifically formulated for dogs and contains beef and poultry flavors that they'll love. It controls plaque and fights bad breath, all without foaming. Give your dog the gift of healthy teeth and gums with Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs. Order now and see the difference it can make!

311.displayed_text:
Prompt

Using the item keywords and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs - Beef Flavor

Item keywords:
Formulated specifically for dogs
Does not foam
Controls plaque
Fights bad breath
Beef and poultry flavors

Response A

Dental health is critical for everyone, even man's best friend. Petrodex Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is formulated specifically for dogs. The non-foaming formula helps control plaque and fights bad breath in your pooch. Offered in poultry or beef flavors, there's something for every pet's palette to ensure acceptance.

Response B

Attention dog owners! Are you tired of your dog's bad breath and plaque-covered teeth? Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is the solution you've been searching for. This toothpaste is specifically formulated for dogs and contains beef and poultry flavors that they'll love. It controls plaque and fights bad breath, all without foaming. Give your dog the gift of healthy teeth and gums with Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs. Order now and see the difference it can make!
